name: Badminton Cups 2015
description:
The arrival of the 2015 season ......

You will be Lin Dan, Lee Chong Wei, Li Xue Rui, Saina NEHWAL ...

Olympic Games, World Championships, World Cup, Sudirman Cup, Thomas Cup ...

Grand Slam honors, world rankings ...

Wonderful shot, slash at smb, small balls ...

Badminton will bring unusual pleasure and enjoyment.
